Jian

Introduction

Jian is a South Korean singer and cheerleader under S Media Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group LAYSHA and former member of the trot girl group RuViChe. She a cheerleader for AI Peppers and Jeonju KCC Egis and was a member of the model girl group OH!Venus. She was a racing model.
